snippet.title: PSX Longplay [358] Oh No
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: NPI

I'm not sure if I understood correctly how the modes are called, but it goes something like this:

00:00:28 Ohno mode (main story, named after this mode's protagonist Bradah Ohno)
01:06:13 Ono mode (alternate story, named after this mode's protagonist Alessa Ono)
01:31:35 2 Player modes

There is also a crazy mode which is exactly the same as Ohno mode but you can click the enemies and don't have the HP bar, so I didn't went through all that again. The other selections are for options, controls, highscores etc. or you can play the dancing stages again. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
